metadata.name: Bahjah XCIX
metadata.description:
The Bahjah fine art piece is an exclusive crowd-puller piece. A turquoise marble covered with gold that will guarantee head-turning and leaving people in sheer awe.

Being encouraged by the greatest of artists, 1984 fashioned something unseen in the web3 space where genuine art collectors are queued to get their hands on extraordinary and astonished pieces.

Bahjah meaning delight and enchantment is believed to bring bliss to everyone that gets caught by its beauty.

It is said that the turquoise stone, exquisite in itself, has a calming effect on the viewer.

1984 decorated these stones with a selection of explicit preferred elementals from gold to diamonds and more.

There will only be a specific few made of these marvelous made art pieces.

“Art can capture you and get you obsessed with it.” 1984
